connectivity.name: connectivity
connectivity.description: 连通性/可达性约束，如连通图或可达要求

acyclicity.name: acyclicity
acyclicity.description: 无环性约束，如 DAG 或森林结构

planarity.name: planarity
planarity.description: 平面性约束，图需可平面嵌入

bipartiteness.name: bipartiteness
bipartiteness.description: 二部性约束，图为二部图

degree_bound.name: degree_bound
degree_bound.description: 度数上下界约束，如节点度限制

path_constraint.name: path_constraint
path_constraint.description: 路径约束，如路径长度/简单路径限制

matching_constraint.name: matching_constraint
matching_constraint.description: 匹配约束，如最大/完美匹配

flow_constraint.name: flow_constraint
flow_constraint.description: 流量/容量约束，如守恒或容量限制

coloring_constraint.name: coloring_constraint
coloring_constraint.description: 染色约束，如相邻不同色或色数限制

spanning_constraint.name: spanning_constraint
spanning_constraint.description: 生成结构约束，如生成树/生成子图

ordering.name: ordering
ordering.description: 有序性约束，如单调、排序或字典序

distinctness.name: distinctness
distinctness.description: 唯一性约束，如元素互异或去重

adjacency_relation.name: adjacency_relation
adjacency_relation.description: 相邻关系约束，如相等/差值/相邻互斥

frequency_bound.name: frequency_bound
frequency_bound.description: 频次约束，如出现次数上界/下界

subsequence_constraint.name: subsequence_constraint
subsequence_constraint.description: 子序列/子串约束，如包含或排除

permutation_constraint.name: permutation_constraint
permutation_constraint.description: 排列/置换约束，如逆序对或循环结构

range_bound.name: range_bound
range_bound.description: 值域/范围约束，如元素上下界

sum_constraint.name: sum_constraint
sum_constraint.description: 和约束，如区间和/前缀和条件

linear_relation.name: linear_relation
linear_relation.description: 线性关系约束，如线性方程或不等式

modular_arithmetic.name: modular_arithmetic
modular_arithmetic.description: 模运算约束，如取模结果限制

convexity.name: convexity
convexity.description: 凸性约束，如凸包或凸多边形

distance_bound.name: distance_bound
distance_bound.description: 距离约束，如曼哈顿/欧氏距离限制

orientation.name: orientation
orientation.description: 方向/朝向约束，如顺逆时针

subset_constraint.name: subset_constraint
subset_constraint.description: 子集约束，如子集选择或大小限制

partition.name: partition
partition.description: 划分约束，如分组或等价类划分

coverage.name: coverage
coverage.description: 覆盖约束，如区间或集合覆盖

operation_type.name: operation_type
operation_type.description: 操作类型限制，如仅交换/翻转/插入

state_transition.name: state_transition
state_transition.description: 状态转移约束，如合法转移

transformation.name: transformation
transformation.description: 变换/替换/映射规则约束

pattern_matching.name: pattern_matching
pattern_matching.description: 模式匹配约束，如通配符

alphabet_constraint.name: alphabet_constraint
alphabet_constraint.description: 字符集约束，如字母表大小

tree_symmetry.name: tree_symmetry
tree_symmetry.description: 树结构的对称性约束，如根节点位置对称或子树结构对称

pair_count_constraint.name: pair_count_constraint
pair_count_constraint.description: 成对关系计数约束，用于描述有序对中满足特定顺序关系（如升序）的个数限制

range_continuity.name: range_continuity
range_continuity.description: 值域连续性约束，要求区间内数值连续或无间隔

range_segment_count.name: range_segment_count
range_segment_count.description: 区间分段数量约束，限制连续区间的分割段数

value_continuity.name: value_continuity
value_continuity.description: 数值连续性约束，强调序列或集合中数值的连续变化

custom_constraint.name: custom_constraint
custom_constraint.description: 自定义约束，用于表示未明确归类的特殊逻辑或非标准约束条件
